dataList.name: 寂静
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, gain 5 Bind next turn, and deal +20% damage when attacking with a type or Affinity the target is Weak or Fatal to.
(Once per turn.)

dataList.name: 余烬
dataList.desc:
On clash win, inflict Burn by (Wrath Abs. / 2).
(Once per skill.)

dataList.name: 岛石爷
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 3 Blunt Protection and Sloth Protection.

dataList.name: 倦怠
dataList.desc:
Attack Skill Final Power +2.
If 10+ turns into the battle, gain 2 Protection every turn, but lower Attack Skill Final Power by 2.

dataList.name: 液态帐幕
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, apply 2 Protection to the ally with the lowest HP. (Including self.)

dataList.name: 会痛的哦！
dataList.desc: +10% damage for every negative status effect on this unit. (Up to 50%)

dataList.name: 过度激情
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, gain Haste and Defense Power Down next turn by (Lust Abs. / 2) this turn.

dataList.name: 抑郁浪潮
dataList.desc:
The target of the rightmost skill on the Dashboard loses SP by (2x Gloom Abs.) after the attack
(Abnormalities take Gloom damage instead)

dataList.name: 艺术
dataList.desc: At the start of combat phase, gain Slash DMG Up and Fragile by (Wrath Abs. /2) this turn.

dataList.name: 终末火柴之光
dataList.desc: Every 4th skill used gains +4 Final Power and inflicts 4 Burn with each of its attacks.

dataList.name: 拒绝审判
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, gain 3 Protection if the unit is targeted by 3 or more skills.

dataList.name: 最终调试
dataList.desc: If the E.G.O Skill <You Want To Get Beat? Hurtily?> is used at less than 25% HP, gain 3 Attack Power Up, Defense Power Up, and Haste every turn, but then die in 3 turns.

dataList.name: 天降启示
dataList.desc: After winning a clash with the leftmost skill on the Dashboard, apply 1 Attack Power Up or Defense Power Up to a random ally next turn.

dataList.name: 涟漪
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, heal SP for the ally with the lowest SP by (Gloom Abs.), excluding those in Panic.

dataList.name: 束缚丝带
dataList.desc: The target of the leftmost skill on the Dashboard is inflicted with (Lust Abs. / 4) Lust Fragility next turn.

dataList.name: 竞争精神
dataList.desc: When another ally defeats an enemy, gain 2 Attack Power Up, 2 Haste, and 4 Fragile next turn.

dataList.name: 咆哮
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, gain Charge by half that turn’s Envy Abs. (Envy Abs. / 2)

dataList.name: 强迫症
dataList.desc:
Clash Power +2 in clashes whose win rate is in the unit’s favor.
Clash Power -2 in clashes whose win rate is against the unit’s favor.

dataList.name: 粉色丝带
dataList.desc: On clash win, inflict 3 Pink Ribbons and Bind next turn.

dataList.name: 火瀑
dataList.desc: On hit, if the target had Burn, inflict 1 Burn on 3 random enemies.

dataList.name: 遣散费
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 1 Slash DMG Up. Lose 10 SP whenever a unit on either side dies.

dataList.name: 星星之火
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has Burn, heal HP by (Wrath Abs.)% of Max HP.

dataList.name: 极寒
dataList.desc:
On hit, if the target has 5+ Sinking, inflict 1 Bind and Attack Power Down.
(3 times per unit.)

dataList.name: 不稳定
dataList.desc:
At the start of the combat phase, gain Attack Power Up by (Gluttony Abs. / 2).
Next turn, gain that much Attack Power Down, and the above effect doesn’t activate.

dataList.name: 活祭
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy with an attack or counter skill, gain 5 E.G.O resources of that skill’s Affinity.

dataList.name: 完美战术
dataList.desc: If the unit did not get hit at all during a turn, gain 1 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: 猜疑生根
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 Pierce DMG Up.
On hit with a Heads coin, inflict 1 Bind and +1 Rupture Count next turn.

dataList.name: 遁入虚空
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 Lust DMG Up.
Gain 1 more when below 0 SP.

dataList.name: 意外形变
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if below 25% HP, heal 15 HP and gain 2 Protection.
A random other ally loses 15 SP.

dataList.name: 蛆虫
dataList.desc: On hit, inflict 5 Maggots at a (Gluttony Abs. x8)% chance.

dataList.name: 吸收养料
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy that has Rupture, heal HP by (Gluttony Abs.)% of Max HP.

dataList.name: 无序放电
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, a random ally with Charge gains +(Envy Abs. / 2) Charge Count.

dataList.name: 自适充能
dataList.desc:
While this unit has Charge, deal +2% damage per Charge Count.
Skills spend -2 Charge Count.
